 ▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬  
 
►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week we got a new type of RAM called LPCAMM2 from Micron and Samsung in a Lenovo laptop to replace SO-DIMM, the US passed a weird new Huawei ban on Intel and Qualcomm chips and OpenAI and Microsoft are kinda decoupling from each other.

Episode 197
 
This video on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/tfc-memory-just-got-a-lot-better
